application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Condition 4 (submission of details - a) existing and proposed window section details of each window type (vertical and horizontal) with dimensions annotated at a scale of 1:20; b) Details of the proposed railings (height at 1.1m from finished floor level) of planning permission PP/24/05391 (Replacement of rear lower ground floor bay window and enlarged doors. Reconfigured rear ground floor balcony, replacement external staircase and associated glazed privacy screens. Changing of window to door at rear ground floor. Alteration to front lower ground floor door and addition of door to front lightwell. Rebuilding with like-for-like first floor side extension. Addition of rooflight to main roof; addition of roof access hatch. Replacement fenestration throughout. New acoustic enclosures for condensers to side of the house and on the roof))
